House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08037
FULL TITLE : AN ACT STRENGTHENING THE EMPLOYMENT RIGHTS FOR MEMBERS OF THE CITIZEN ARMED FORCES FOR THE RESERVED FORCE OF THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Aims to protect military reservist from discrimination in job hiring, reintegration, promotion, or any employment benefits. Ensures reservists proper training and compensation and guarantees those injured or disabled during their service reintegration to the civilian work force .
ALIAS NAME : “Reservist Employment Rights Act.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-08-06
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
